betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Is this search for knowledge a selfish one? Yes, yes it is. 
I really should have admitted this earlier. Why did I want the Nobel Prize to begin with?! I just wanted to be recognized, I wanted to be seen as the one that cares about knowledge. 
Why am I fighting this war? I kept telling myself this is for the Testificates, this is to stop immortal bullies to play with the universe. And yet, it still ends up being about me. I am the one that has to do it. Nobody else. I... Me... Myself...
Why can't I be with someone else on this journey? I just now realize I am lonely, a lonely selfish pawn of a fate too big for me to even comprehend.
